name: BeerHunter
description:
Beers, beers and more beers!!! 

Catch the power of mixing three liters of Beer from the same jar and win extra points.

Don't let the drunk-o-meter touch the bottom or you will fall to the smely floor of the drunkers in the back out of the tabern.

-----------------------

This game was made with Godot Engine v3.3.2 in 2 days for my first Jam!!

STOP WAITING FOR GODOT

I hope you enjoy it ^_^

-----------------------

Many many thanks to the creators of some of the assets provided on this game:

  • Beers Made by PulsarX Studio: Fantasy Medieval Beer Icons
  • Background Music is "Not-Really-Lost" by Goose Ninja: Happy Loops
